article_text: The Supreme Court could gut President Barack Obama’s signature health care law over four simple words, "established by the state." What does it mean? Our PolitiFact Sheet on King vs. Burwell explains.

article_metadata.title: Health care law in King v. Burwell explained | Miami Herald

article_summary:
The Supreme Court could gut President Barack Obama’s signature health care law over four simple words, "established by the state."
Our PolitiFact Sheet on King vs. Burwell explains.
What does it mean?
